title: OxygenOS 12 Open Beta 1 based on Android 12 now available for OnePlus 8/8 Pro and 8T
content:
After what has felt like a long wait, OxygenOS 12 is now available in preview form for the OnePlus 8, 8 Pro, and 8T with the release of Open Beta 1.

moreâ€¦

The post OxygenOS 12 Open Beta 1 based on Android 12 now available for OnePlus 8/8 Pro and 8T appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After a long wait, OxygenOS 12 is now available in preview form for the OnePlus 8, 8 Pro, and 8T with the release of Open Beta 1.
